Name: this House
About the game: this House uniquely blends single player RPG exploration, hand-drawn art, puzzle solving, surreal humour and a creepy atmosphere. Discover the mysteries and secrets of this House through exploration and puzzle solving Logical and lateral thinking is required to solve the many devious puzzles A unique hand drawn art style An unusual take on crafting where multiple items can be combined A choice of characters to choose from at the start with more to unlock An original atmospheric soundtrack A variety of unique arcade style minigames based on the main story. These feature: Shoot the Skulls: Use a plant pot to fire a tennis ball at skulls (Just a normal day at the office) Skull Sweeper : Use your brain to move the skulls to the correct colours
